Home » 16A5 Pañcakanipātapāḷi » 3 Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka » 3.3 Gilānavagga
3.3.6 Dutiyaanāyussāsutta
Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka
Gilānavagga
Dutiyaanāyussāsutta
126.
716“Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā anāyussā. Katame pañca? Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, dussīlo ca, pāpamitto ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
717Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā āyussā. Katame pañca? Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, sīlavā ca, kalyāṇamitto ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
718Chaṭṭhaṃ.
